name: Handle query parameters passed to an HTTP endpoint
Handle url parameters in an HTTP endpoint
Include data captured in another flow
Serve a local file
info:
Without content-type set, the browser will
download the file rather than display it.

Need to set content-type to the correct
mime type for the file.

    curl http://localhost:1880/hello-file

name: Post form/JSON data
info:
Posting form data - `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`

    curl -X POST -d "name=Nick" http://localhost:1880/hello-form
    
    
Posting JSON data - `application/json`

    curl -X POST -d '{"name":"Nick"}' -h "Content-type: application/json" http://localhost:1880/hello-form

name: Post raw data
info:
Posting raw data - `text/plain`

    curl -X POST -d 'Nick' -h "Content-type: text/plain" http://localhost:1880/hello-raw

so it doesn't get escaped
